ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Really cool corpse locating tip
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope, just gives the loc of where you are, not your sight. ... Neat idea. I d guess that this wouldn t work, but who knows. Any idea what the duration is
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:27 AM 12/28/00 -1000, you wrote:
>Does anyone know how the /loc command works when you bind sight? I assume
>it still tells you your current location and not the location of where the
>target is that you have bound your sight to. Would be neat if we could
>target someone who died, locate their corpse, bind sight to their corpse,
>and then tell them the /loc of it.

Nope, just gives the loc of where you are, not your sight.

>I'll give it a try tonight to test it for myself.
>
>What about if you have a SS helm and summon the Eye of Zomm? Can you summon
>the Eye, turn on the corpse locating song, and then lead the person to their
>corpse with the Eye instead of going yourself? This could be useful in
>situations when you don't want to leave your party.

Neat idea. I'd guess that this wouldn't work, but who knows. Any idea what
the duration is of Eye of Zomm from the helm? I know my magician's Eye of
Zomm has a very short duration. Not sure it'd stay around long enough to
help someone locate their corpse.

---Windleaf
